trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [result v] to [1] ask [Enter an integer for the base:] and wait set [base v] to (answer) ask [Enter a positve integer for the power:] and wait set [power v] to (answer) repeat (power) set [result v] to ((result) * (base)) end say (join (join (join (join (base) [^]) (power)) [ = ]) (result))
